songs.title: Crystal and pistols
songs.lyrics:
Intro gang skrt skrt yeah kdog let's get it


Chorus crystal and pistols shoot a nigga pistol skrt skrt



Verse 1 kdog on the track on fire going far I got bars I don't do no fake shit going hard with pistols then shoot a nigga with crystal pew pew pew hello I keep the k though you thought running it hard aye top off with clars trapping in rair fire bang bitches all around yeah man skrt skrt
